title: I need LoL support.
body: My client keeps, flickering on the play button.And, on screen.Can I have your support on this client?

replies.body: That sounds really strange, possible a driver or hardware issue causing this flickering.  Do you have a screenshot handy?  My suggestion here would be to go over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure your drivers are up to date, then give it another go.  Hope that helps!
I just bought a mac, its super new.I never had this problem, until the new update the play button and chat lobby is flickering.Before it wasn't flickering.Is there any solution to solve this problem?
http://imgur.com/a/Wr3Q4  I've tried restarting again, and ive disabled and re-enabled my graphics card and it still doesnt work. Not sure why.
Thanks for the screenshot.  Are you using an AMD video card, and recently had it updated?  If so, what happens if you roll it back?
